job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are a marketplace where users can compare personalized, prequalified rates and quotes from multiple lenders and carriers, for student loans, mortgages, personal loans, and insurance.
       We're challenging the status quo by giving power to the consumer. We believe in a world where 'ethical', 'lending', and 'insurance' can coexist, so we set out to build innovative platforms that actually work for customers. Our mission is to help people find the best loan or insurance policy possible.
       We believe researching and buying loans or insurance shouldn't be confusing or complex, so we've focused on simplicity. We've created the only unbiased loan and insurance buying process out there, which makes finding options straightforward and clear.
       We are looking for a talented and passionate Software Engineer to join our central AI-focused software engineering team. This is a unique opportunity to be part of the team that will shape the future of our AI capabilities and transform the way we serve our users. We are looking for a creative and curious individual with a strong passion for AI, and a track record of working on innovative projects.
       show more
       Responsibilities

     * Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
     * Design, develop and deploy full-stack solutions that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications.
     * Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and integration testing, to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.
     * Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
     * Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.
job_details.full_text:
Middle+ / Senior Software Engineer - AI

We are a marketplace where users can compare personalized, prequalified rates and quotes from multiple lenders and carriers, for student loans, mortgages, personal loans, and insurance.
       We're challenging the status quo by giving power to the consumer. We believe in a world where 'ethical', 'lending', and 'insurance' can coexist, so we set out to build innovative platforms that actually work for customers. Our mission is to help people find the best loan or insurance policy possible.
       We believe researching and buying loans or insurance shouldn't be confusing or complex, so we've focused on simplicity. We've created the only unbiased loan and insurance buying process out there, which makes finding options straightforward and clear.
       We are looking for a talented and passionate Software Engineer to join our central AI-focused software engineering team. This is a unique opportunity to be part of the team that will shape the future of our AI capabilities and transform the way we serve our users. We are looking for a creative and curious individual with a strong passion for AI, and a track record of working on innovative projects.
       show more
       Responsibilities

     * Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
     * Design, develop and deploy full-stack solutions that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications.
     * Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and integration testing, to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.
     * Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
     * Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes designing, developing, and deploying full-stack solutions that integrate AI capabilities into web applications, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on user-facing systems. The responsibilities also include optimizing for performance and scalability, and staying updated with AI advancements, further supporting this classification.

phrases: We are a marketplace where users can compare personalized, prequalified rates and quotes from multiple lenders and carriers, for student loans, mortgages, personal loans, and insurance.
Our mission is to help people find the best loan or insurance policy possible.
We believe researching and buying loans or insurance shouldn't be confusing or complex, so we've focused on simplicity.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the company's business domain (financial marketplace), its core mission, and its approach to user experience, indicating an understanding of the business context.

phrases: Design, develop and deploy full-stack solutions that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications.
Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and integration testing, to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.
Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions designing, developing, and deploying full-stack solutions, integrating AI into web applications, and performing unit/integration testing, which are core software development activities.

phrases: deploy full-stack solutions
ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.
Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
job_tasks.justification: Deploying solutions, ensuring quality, performance, and scalability are key aspects of operationalizing and maintaining AI features in production environments.

phrases: AI-driven features
AI capabilities
latest advancements in AI technologies
continuous improvement of AI driven features
job_tasks.justification: The job description repeatedly mentions 'AI-driven features' and 'AI capabilities', indicating a focus on working with and developing models or systems that leverage AI, even if specific model types aren't detailed.

phrases: Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams' directly points to the need for effective communication and teamwork.

phrases: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.
job_tasks.justification: The requirement to 'Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies' highlights the need for continuous learning and adaptability in a fast-evolving field.

phrases: provide technical insights
deliver AI-driven features
Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical insights, delivering features, and optimizing for performance and scalability all imply a problem-solving approach to technical challenges.

phrases: shape the future of our AI capabilities
transform the way we serve our users.
creative and curious individual with a strong passion for AI, and a track record of working on innovative projects.
contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.
job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'shape the future', 'innovative projects', and 'contribute ideas' suggest a need for initiative, innovation, and taking ownership of AI feature development.
